LanguageData.Yeast.label: 酵母
LanguageData.grainmash.label: 谷物原浆
LanguageData.grainmash.description: A mixture of yeast and wheat to ferment into Whisky。
LanguageData.sakemash.label: 清酒原浆
LanguageData.sakemash.description: A mixture of yeast and rice to ferment into Saké。
LanguageData.rummash.label: 朗姆原浆
LanguageData.rummash.description: A mixture of yeast and sugar cane to ferment into Rum。
LanguageData.cidermash.label: 苹果原浆
LanguageData.cidermash.description: A mixture of yeast and apples to ferment into Cider。
LanguageData.berrymash.label: 浆果原浆
LanguageData.berrymash.description: A mixture of yeast and various berries to ferment into Berrywine。
LanguageData.vodkamash.label: 伏特加原浆
LanguageData.vodkamash.description: A mixture of yeast and raw potatoes to ferment into Vodka。
LanguageData.tequilamash.label: 龙舌兰原浆
LanguageData.tequilamash.description: A mixture of yeast and blue agave to ferment into Tequila。
LanguageData.winemash.label: 葡萄原浆
LanguageData.winemash.description: A mixture of yeast and grapes to ferment into Wine。
